subject: Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Wimbledon remains the only one of the four grand slam events with a preprogrammed pause, a hiatus that seems even more of an anomaly now that the French Open has added a 15th day of play.
snippet: Wimbledon remains the only one of the four grand slam events with a preprogrammed pause, a hiatus that seems even more of an anomaly now that the French Open has added a 15th day of play.
